## registerAuthenticationStrategy() function

Registers an authentication strategy as an extension of the AuthenticationBindings.AUTHENTICATION\_STRATEGY\_EXTENSION\_POINT\_NAME extension point.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function registerAuthenticationStrategy(context: Context, strategyClass: Constructor<AuthenticationStrategy>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | <code>Context</code> |  |
|  strategyClass | <code>Constructor&lt;AuthenticationStrategy&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
